backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, presence tracking, messaging structures, and access-controlled APIs, including persistent data maps and profile management functions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old userPresence data (Bool) to new format with last-seen timestamps, defaulting timestamps to 0.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping presence-related features to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing styling, components, hooks, screens, and presence-related UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, global border and background rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint containing root div and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application configuring routing, theme, query client, identity provider, and splash handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting new users for name and optional phone number, validating input and saving profiles via backend.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication gate that redirects unauthenticated users to the login screen and shows a loading spinner while initializing.
Renders incoming or outgoing chat bubbles with text, timestamps, status icons, and optional file or image attachments.
Displays a full chat thread, merging backend and optimistic messages, handling sending logic, scrolling, presence, and header actions.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageInpu: Provides a text and file input bar for composing and sending messages with attachment handling and validation.
frontend/src/components/contacts/AddCont: Modal dialog allowing users to add contacts via principal ID or phone number with validation and submission states.
frontend/src/components/contacts/Contact: Shows the contact list with presence indicators and a button to add new contacts via the AddContactDialog.
frontend/src/components/conversations/Co: Lists contacts as conversation entries with presence info and lets users select a conversation.
frontend/src/components/layout/NeonScaff: Provides the neon-themed app layout wrapper with background effects and an Outlet for nested routes.
frontend/src/components/presence/Presenc: Simple presence indicator dot showing online or offline status.
Displays online status or formatted last-seen text based on presence data.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar with optional photo, initials fallback, and size variants.
frontend/src/components/splash/LogoSplas: Displays a timed splash animation with enter/hold/exit phases and triggers a completion callback.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCom: Provides a dialog for composing statuses with text, photo, video, or audio, including validation and upload handling.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusVie: Displays statuses with navigation, audio handling, author info, and delete support.
frontend/src/components/status/useSwipeN: Hook enabling left/right swipe detection on a referenced container.
frontend/src/components/status/VisibleSt: Groups statuses by author and renders a scrollable list with previews and selection handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogoSplash.ts: Controls when the splash screen is shown based on animation timing and initialization state.
Sends periodic presence heartbeats and updates presence on visibility changes or unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Listens for the PWA install prompt event and exposes a function to trigger installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, photos, contacts, and related actor-backed data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, neon/cyber utilities, and splash animation styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHelpScreen.tsx: Displays admin status, principal tools, and explanations for admin access with navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/ChatScreen.tsx: Main chat UI handling presence, navigation, profile access, and contact/thread interaction.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadInstallScreen: Shows install instructions and PWA install button, with link copying and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders the login UI using Internet Identity, handles login flow, errors, and redirects when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/PremiumScreen.tsx: Displays premium feature previews with a placeholder upgrade action and navigation back to the main screen.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePhotoScreen.ts: Allows users to upload, validate, preview, and save a new profile photo with size and resolution checks and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileScreen.tsx: Shows and edits user profile details including name, phone, principal ID, and profile photo, with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/pages/StatusScreen.tsx: Displays visible statuses, provides a composer for creating new ones, and includes a viewer with delete handling and navigation.
frontend/src/utils/audioUrlFetch.ts: Fetches and validates audio files from URLs, enforcing audio content type and a 1GB size limit.
frontend/src/utils/audioValidation.ts: Provides helpers to validate audio files and byte arrays for type and size, including human-readable size formatting.
frontend/src/utils/formatLastSeen.ts: Converts a nanosecond timestamp into a human‑readable last‑seen string with relative time rules.
frontend/src/utils/imageValidation.ts: Decodes images to read dimensions, checks against a 100MP limit, and formats file sizes.
frontend/src/utils/phoneNumber.ts: Normalizes and validates phone numbers to E.164 format with digit and length checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, fonts, and container settings with additional plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project scope, architecture notes, issues, and implemented features for the Jero chat app.
